-- DDL generated by Postico 1.5.19
-- Not all database features are supported. Do not use for backup.

-- Table Definition ----------------------------------------------

CREATE TABLE api_vehicle (
    equipment_id character varying(10) UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY,
    vin character varying(17) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
    year smallint CHECK (year >= 0),
    description character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    company_assign character varying(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-'::character varying,
    ownership character varying(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Financed'::character varying,
    mileage integer NOT NULL DEFAULT 0
);

-- Indices -------------------------------------------------------

CREATE UNIQUE INDEX api_vehicle_equipment_id_key ON api_vehicle(equipment_id text_ops);
CREATE INDEX api_vehicle_equipment_id_66eba193_like ON api_vehicle(equipment_id varchar_pattern_ops);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX api_vehicle_pkey ON api_vehicle(equipment_id text_ops);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX api_vehicle_vin_key ON api_vehicle(vin text_ops);
